title: Wonderla Bamba
description: A 14-seater thrill ride that spins unpredictably with sudden drops and bursts of speed. Perfect for first-time thrill-seekers and groups.

title: Space Gun
description: Get lifted 18.5 metres high before being plunged down! This ride flips and spins you around its axis, offering intense upside-down thrills.

title: Hyperverse
description: A cutting-edge Metaverse 3D Theater with 8K display, 360째 surround sound, and 270째 light and shadow effects. Accommodates 30+ people for a 5-minute immersive journey.

title: Equinox
description: Pendulum ride with outward-facing suspended seats, swinging at up to 70 kmph and rotating on its axis. Reaches 16m above ground for an extreme thrill.

title: Air Race
description: Simulates aerial acrobatics with 360째 rotations and high-speed maneuvers, giving the sensation of flying in a stunt plane.

title: Y-Scream
description: A giant swing ride reaching 40 meters in height, delivering free-fall drops and adrenaline-pumping swings.

title: Mission Interstellar
description: An immersive space simulation ride with 270째 projection and zero-gravity effects, taking guests on a journey across the cosmos.

title: Water Pendulum
description: Glide up and down in a U-shaped pendulum slide before coming to a peaceful stop. A thrilling water ride for all ages.

title: Drop Loop
description: Experience a trapdoor drop from 45 feet high, plummeting through loops and curves in a translucent tube.

title: Sea Lagoon
description: A massive water play area with shallow pools, slides, and interactive water features for all ages.

title: Wave Pool
description: Simulated ocean waves in a temperature-controlled pool, with gentle to robust wave options for all ages.

title: Korneto
description: Accelerate down a steep tunnel into a giant funnel, swirling around before landing on a soft splash sofa.

title: Banded Kraits
description: A thrilling multi-lane water slide where you can race your friends to the bottom for a splashy finish.

title: Skrew
description: Twist and turn down a spiraling water slide for a fast and fun aquatic adventure.

title: Harakiri
description: A water slide that levels out midway before throwing you back on the slope for extra fun.

title: Happy Kangaroo
description: A gentle free-fall ride for children, rising 5.5 meters before a safe, exciting drop.

title: Carousel
description: A classic merry-go-round with colorful horses, perfect for young children.

title: Pony Train
description: A fun kids ride themed like a train, where 8 horses pull a chariot for a magical journey.

title: Kiddies Wheel
description: A mini Ferris wheel offering a safe and fun ride for children.

title: Funky Monkey
description: A playful ride for kids with spinning, bouncing, and lots of monkeying around.

title: Jack-O-Coaster
description: A mini roller coaster that climbs up to 4 meters and takes you on a thrilling adventure with three exciting curves and one thrilling dip. With six cabins connected together, it looks just like a giant caterpillar. Fun for all ages, the Jack-O-Coaster is sure to bring smiles and laughter!

title: Pirate Ship
description: This ship makes a radial up & down movement giving a free-fall effect to the people while moving like a pendulum. Lap locks are given in each seat for safety. The ride swings to a 180-degree arc as it gains pace, giving you an escalating sensation of adrenaline.

title: Jumping Frog
description: A merry-go-round where frog-shaped capsules gently leap as they spin. Specially designed for children, this ride offers gentle jumps and fun spins.
